source_sentence: 寶星陀羅尼經卷第五
translation: Jewel Star Dhāraṇī Sutra, Volume 5

source_sentence: 唐天竺三藏波羅頗蜜多羅譯
translation: Translated by the Tang Indian Tripiṭaka Prabhākaramitra

source_sentence: 相品第五
translation: the fifth category of characteristics

source_sentence: 爾時，三千大千世界百億諸魔生如是念：「今佛世尊入王舍城門，我等應以最上莊嚴，嚴飾此城門之內及彼地方，如彼城外天、龍、夜叉之所莊嚴。」
translation: At the time, 10 billion Māra of the 3,000 great one-thousand worlds had this thought, "Now that the Bhagavān has entered the gates of Rājagṛha, we should adorn the interior of this city and that place with the highest adornment, just as the gods, dragons, and yakṣas outside the city are adorned."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以他心智知百億魔心之所念，欲以神通最上色相莊嚴佛處。
translation: At the time, the Bhagavān knew with the knowledge of other minds what ten billion Māra minds were thinking, and he wanted to adorn the Buddha's place with the supreme form of his psychic powers.

source_sentence: 是時，世尊以神通力，於王舍大城十二門內，一一門中皆有如來及諸大眾，共入城門。
translation: Then, with the power of his supernormal abilities, the Bhagavān showed the Tathāgata and the great assembly entering the twelve gates of the great city of Rājagṛha at each of those gates.

source_sentence: 時百億魔即以神通種種莊嚴勝中勝者、阿僧祇等諸莊嚴具，嚴飾城門及地方城壁諸樹，地上虛空勝妙莊嚴而莊嚴之。
translation: Ten billion Māra then adorned the city gates, the trees on the city walls, and the sky on the ground with marvelous adornments of various kinds of adornments, such as the most excellent of all, the incalculable, and so forth.

source_sentence: 時百億魔并諸眷屬，或有作於梵天之形，乃至作於大仙之形，於諸重閣窓門樓櫓却敵樹間諸處地，及虛空各於中住。
translation: At the time, 10 billion Māra and their retinues, some in the form of Brahmā gods or even in the form of a great sage, stayed in those heavy mansions, vaults, gates, towers, rivers, places between the trees, and in the sky.

source_sentence: 以種種華末香燒香金粟銀粟，以摩尼真珠及種種莊嚴以嚴衣服，并諸綺繡莊嚴具等普雨供養。
translation: They make offerings with a variety of flowers, burning incense, gold, silver, and millet, adorn their clothing with precious maṇi beads and various adornments, and rain down ornaments of finery.

source_sentence: 又以種種天之音樂擊鼓拍手，種種讚嘆歌詠如來無量功德，悉皆聚集供養世尊，以如是第一最勝莊嚴大希有相，所未曾有所未曾聞。
translation: They also gathered together to make offerings to the Bhagavān with music from a variety of celestials, beating their drums and hands, and singing in praise of the Tathāgata's measureless merits, with such first, most excellent adornment and great rare features that have never been seen or heard before.

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊住城門下，以右足指觸城門閾，應時無間一切三千大千世界普皆震動，及此三千大千世界所有釋梵日月護世大自在天，天，龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、伽樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽等主，地天水天大海諸山城邑等天，及諸男女童男童女天仙等眾，乃至阿迦尼吒天宮已來，所有眾生得大滋味色貌光澤。
translation: At the time, the Bhagavān was standing beneath the city gates and touched the gates with his right foot, and at that moment, the whole unremitting 3,000 great one-thousand worlds shook, and all the gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, and other lords of the earth, gods of the sky and sea, gods of the mountains and cities, and crowds of boys and girls, gods and sages, even from the palace of Akaniṣṭha Heaven onward, all sentient beings attained a great taste of appearance and radiance.

source_sentence: 彼一切眾見地大動光照覺悟，於王舍大城地及虛空圍遶而住，乃至華香黑栴檀末散佛供養。
translation: Seeing the ground greatly agitated, illuminated, and enlightened, all of them stand around the ground and space of the great city of Rājagṛha, even scattering flowers, scents, and black sandalwood as offerings to the Buddha.

source_sentence: 是時，世尊釋迦牟尼佛，以神通力令彼散華乃至末香，普遍十方微塵等剎，一一方分所有清淨及不清淨、空不空等諸佛剎土，悉皆供養供給彼佛。
translation: At the time, the Bhagavān, Śakyamuni Buddha, with his supernormal powers, caused them to scatter flowers and even scatter powder scents, making offerings to the buddhas and bases of the ten directions, whether they were pure or impure, empty or nonempty, in one part or another.

source_sentence: 彼彼佛剎此所散華，并諸末香莊嚴具等，皆出如是偈句之聲：「汝等疾覺悟，　　觀不放逸行，　最上菩提因，　　流轉甚生死，　我今拔濟汝，　　宜速捨世事。
translation: From the flowers scattered here at each buddha's temple and the fragrant adornments at the end of those flowers, this verse sounds, "You quickly awakened, you observed careless behavior, you were the cause of supreme enlightenment, you wandered through great birth and death, and now I'm rescuing you, so you should quickly abandon worldly affairs.

source_sentence: 憶往昔誓願，　　時到熟相應，　各得菩提記，　　牟尼因陀羅，　利益世間故，　　今入王舍城。
translation: Remembering our past vows, when the time has come to ripen them together, each of us will attain the mark of enlightenment, Muni Indra, for the benefit of the world, and now we'll enter Rājagṛha.

source_sentence: 大仙勝無憂，　　已降百億魔，　轉清淨法輪，　　應當大歡喜。
translation: The great sage is excellent and has no sorrow, has subdued ten billion Māra, and has turned the pure wheel of the Dharma, so he should rejoice greatly.

source_sentence: 如是利世間，　　普示勇健事，　解脫世間苦。
translation: Thus benefiting the world, he universally demonstrates his heroic deeds and liberates the world from suffering.

source_sentence: 今為摩利沙，　當得菩提故，　　今授汝等記。
translation: Now, for the sake of Maricha, who will attain enlightenment, I'll give you this record.

source_sentence: 速往彼剎土，　　見妙好莊嚴，　自然如是得，　　入彼無憂城，　漸次菩提行，　　決定當得佛。」
translation: You should quickly go to that buddha land, see the marvelous beauty and adornment that naturally follows, enter that city of no sorrow, and gradually undertake the practice of enlightenment, certain that you'll attain Buddhahood."

source_sentence: 爾時，十方微塵等一切佛剎彼彼大眾，以佛力故，悉見此佛竹林大眾菩薩摩訶薩各各三昧思量。
translation: At the time, all the buddha-temples and their masses in the ten directions, including the dusty ones, were able to see the bodhisattvas and great masses of bodhisattvas in the bamboo grove each meditating and contemplating because of the Buddha's power.

source_sentence: 是時，竹林所有菩薩摩訶薩思惟住者，并諸聲聞大聲聞，皆見世尊於王舍城門調伏住待。
translation: At the time, all the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and śrāvakas in the Bamboo Grove who were abiding in contemplation saw the Bhagavān standing at the gate of Rājagṛha in submission.

source_sentence: 彼諸大眾隨世尊後住，見大莊嚴具中出諸偈已，悉皆遍滿十方一切微塵等淨不淨、空不空一切佛剎。
translation: Those masses followed the Bhagavān's lead, and after seeing the verses that emerged from the great adornment, they all filled all the dusty, pure, impure, empty, and nonempty buddha bases in the ten directions.

source_sentence: 彼諸佛剎所有菩薩摩訶薩，及住聲聞，聞此聲已，作如是念：「何處有此法聲遍滿如是可意聲？
translation: When the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and resident śrāvakas in those buddha bases heard that sound, they thought, "Where is this Dharma sound that pervades such a desirable sound?

source_sentence: 如是美妙，如是可愛，如是可樂，如是可喜，如是勸發，如是大功德稱揚之聲？」
translation: Thus is it beautiful, thus is it pleasing, thus is it pleasant, thus is it pleasing, thus is it encouraging, thus is the sound of great merit praised?"

source_sentence: 及見華末香雨，雨於十方無量莊嚴，無量華香細末之雨。
translation: They also see a rain of flowers and powdered incense that showers measureless adornments in ten directions and a rain of measureless flowers and fine powdered incense.

source_sentence: 時彼菩薩摩訶薩及大聲聞，捨所作業皆大驚歎。
translation: The bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and śrāvakas then all greatly marveled as they abandoned their activities.

source_sentence: 爾時，釋迦如來即入三昧，名依佛莊嚴嚴飾三昧，入三昧已應時無間一切娑婆世界，及十方一切微塵佛剎所有大眾，悉見此佛剎中如是大莊嚴相。
translation: At that point, the Śākyamuni Tathāgata then entered a concentration called the concentration of relying on the Buddha's adornment and adornment, and after entering that concentration, all the Sahava world and all the masses of dusty buddhas in the ten directions should see such a great adornment in this Buddha's buddha.

source_sentence: 如彼未來世中普見如來淨無染聚世界功德莊嚴，唯無一事，謂城壁等，而自然莊嚴。
translation: As in those future lives, they'll see the Tathāgata's pure, undefiled mass of worldly merit adorned universally, except for one thing, namely, the walls of a city and so forth, which are naturally adorned.

source_sentence: 一切十方諸佛剎土微塵等世界諸佛世尊，普見釋迦如來住王舍大城，光明赫弈甚大端嚴。
translation: All the buddhas of the dusty worlds of the buddha bases in the ten directions see the Tathāgata Śākyamuni standing in the great city of Rājagṛha, whose radiance is brilliant and very large and dignified.

source_sentence: 彼諸佛剎所有大菩薩摩訶薩等及大聲聞，聞此偈已，各皆憶念觀於四方，見此世界如對目前，以一切諸佛境界力故，及見諸天種種莊嚴。
translation: After they heard this verse, all the great bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and śrāvakas in those buddha bases recollectively observed the four directions and saw this world as it is right now, adorned in various ways by the power of all the buddhas' objects and by the gods.

source_sentence: 時彼菩薩摩訶薩等，及大聲聞作如是念：「我等決定往於彼土大集會中莊嚴之處，及彼佛剎功德莊嚴普觀察之，見釋迦如來已，修行供養我等於彼佛所，得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。」
translation: The bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and great śrāvakas then had this thought, "We're definitely going to go to that place in the great assembly of adornment, and we'll thoroughly examine the adornment of the merits of that buddha's blaze, and after seeing the Śākyamuni Tathāgata, we'll cultivate and make offerings to him and obtain the assurance of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment."

source_sentence: 時彼十方一切佛剎微塵等世界，諸菩薩摩訶薩等及大聲聞，釋迦如來神力加故，各自佛剎，於剎那羅婆摸呼多頃，彼沒此現到娑婆世界。
translation: At the time, in ten directions, all the buddha bases, particles, and other worlds, the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and great śrāvakas, each had their own buddha bases, and they all disappeared into the Śākya world because of the Tathāgata's miraculous powers.

source_sentence: 時彼十方一一方分無量無數佛剎，微塵等菩薩摩訶薩，一切悉來到此佛剎，地及虛空遍滿而住。
translation: At the time, measureless and countless buddha bases in one part of the ten directions, dusty bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and so forth all came to this buddha bode, filling the earth and space and staying there.

source_sentence: 彼諸菩薩摩訶薩等，各依菩薩種種善根若干力故，修營供養釋迦如來。
translation: Each of those bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and others cultivated and made offerings to the Śākyamuni Tathāgata based on the various powers of the bodhisattvas' good roots.

source_sentence: 且置是事，或有菩薩於此佛剎，雨種種華一切遍滿，為供養事供養世尊；或有雨於種種真珠，乃至或有金銀毘琉璃頗梨、石藏寶摸薩羅、牛頭栴檀、龍堅栴檀、多摩羅葉，悉以為末而滿虛空，為供養事供養世尊；或有雨於種種嚴飾諸莊嚴具衣服綺繡，為供養事供養世尊；或竪種種幢幡華蓋，為供養事供養世尊；或燒種種之香，或散種種寶鬘，或擊種種伎樂，或有示現種種歌舞，或有種種香水雨此方地而灑潤之，或有種種寶器盛種種寶，於世尊前捧持供養。
translation: 且置是事，或有菩薩於此佛剎，雨種種華一切遍滿，為供養事供養世尊；或有雨於種種真珠，乃至或有金銀毘琉璃頗梨、石藏寶摸薩羅、牛頭栴檀、龍堅栴檀、多摩羅葉，悉以為末而滿虛空，為供養事供養世尊；或有雨於種種嚴飾諸莊嚴具衣服綺繡，為供養事供養世尊；或竪種種幢幡華蓋，為供養事供養世尊；或燒種種之香，或散種種寶鬘，或擊種種伎樂，或有示現種種歌舞，或有種種香水雨此方地而灑潤之，或有種種寶器盛種種寶，於世尊前捧持供養。

source_sentence: 或有種種寶器盛滿香水，以華果葉而莊嚴之，於世尊前捧持供養。
translation: Or there may be a variety of precious vessels filled with perfume and adorned with flowers, fruits, and leaves that are held in front of the Bhagavān and offered in worship.

source_sentence: 或有種種寶樹種種天衣，華果莊嚴舉手捧持，於世尊前為供養事。
translation: Sometimes there are various jeweled trees and various heavenly garments adorned with flowers and fruits that they hold in their hands as an offering before the Bhagavān.

source_sentence: 或有化作大梵天身合掌佛前，乃至廣說如前所作。
translation: Some take on the body of a great brahma god and fold their palms in front of the Buddha, explaining in detail what they've done as before.

source_sentence: 或有化作師子之形，於世尊前如是禮拜。
translation: Some take on the form of a lion and venerate the Bhagavān like this.

source_sentence: 彼諸眾生以佛神力，及自善根加護力故，互相觀視，於自眼根不取諸色。
translation: Because of the Buddha's spiritual power and the power to protect their own good roots, those sentient beings look at each other and don't perceive any form in their own eye faculty.

source_sentence: 以佛世尊現如是相，及魔王所作、大境界天之所作若干境界，及以如來自念處、正斷、神足、根、力、覺、道、十八不共法諸佛境界若干變現，隨世尊後入王舍大城，向彼中街蓮華之所。
translation: Because the Bhagavān thus appeared, he was followed into the great city of Rājagṛha by certain forms created by Māra, certain forms created by the gods of the great realm, and certain manifestations of the Tathāgata's own mindfulness of abode, correct elimination, spiritual abilities, faculties, powers, awakening, path, and the 18 distinctive qualities of the Buddha's realm, he went to the lotus position in the middle of the street.

source_sentence: 世尊到已，以右手掌摩蓮華葉而挽住之。
translation: When the Bhagavān arrived, he put his right palm on the lotus's leaf and held it in place.

source_sentence: 時彼蓮華因挽動故，於此佛剎，一切魔宮魔所坐處悉皆振動。
translation: As a result of that lotus' support, this buddha's palace and all the places where Māra and Māra sit are shaken.

source_sentence: 彼魔男女所有眷屬，及諸徒眾所居住者，皆生怖畏驚愕而住，自相謂言：「無因無緣我此宮室如是震動，莫復我等魔王境界自失位耶！
translation: Those Māra men, women, their retinues, and their followers who were staying there were all terrified and startled, and they said to each other, "There's no reason or cause for this palace of mine to shake like that; could it be that we Māra Kings have lost our positions in the realm?

source_sentence: 莫復我等所住宮室滅沒之法於此起耶！
translation: Could it be that the dharma of the disappearance of the palace where we live has arisen here?

source_sentence: 我等今者決須觀察。」
translation: We must now examine it."

source_sentence: 時彼諸魔，見此事已作如是念：「此佛剎土昔是五濁，誰復今者能令如是微妙莊嚴甚可愛樂？」
translation: After seeing this, those Māras thought, "Who else could have made this Buddha's buddha land, which used to be five turbidities, such subtle adornment and great delight?"

source_sentence: 時彼諸魔，於自境界所居住處，并諸眷屬悉不復見，唯見釋迦如來三十二相大人之相，具足莊嚴光明赫弈甚大顯照。
translation: At the time, those Māras didn't see again where they lived in their own realm and their retinues, but only the Tathāgata's thirty-two marks of a great personage, fully adorned with a radiant and brilliant light that shone brightly and greatly.

source_sentence: 於此一切三千大千世界及一切佛剎，種種諸相色貌現住眾生普遍，而無有一可識眾生。
translation: Here in all 3,000 great one-thousand worlds and all the buddha bases, the various forms and appearances of sentient beings appearing and abiding are widespread, but there isn't a single sentient being who can be identified.

source_sentence: 時彼一切無量眾生，於世尊前悉見修營為供養事。
translation: Countless numbers of those sentient beings are then seen in front of the Bhagavān, cultivating and making offerings.

source_sentence: 時彼諸魔，作如是念：「我等決定往彼釋迦如來所，見已禮拜并諸所問：『我等魔王并諸眷屬，今日悉皆何處去耶？』」
translation: Those Māras then had this thought, "We decided to go to the Śākyamuni Tathāgata, venerate him after we saw him, and ask, 'Where are we Māra Kings and our retinues going today?'"

source_sentence: 爾時，此佛世界百俱胝魔，并諸眷屬往世尊所，到已恭敬於佛前住。
translation: At the time, a hundred Māra kings from this Buddha's world and their retinues went to the Bhagavān and stayed in front of him in reverence when they arrived.

source_sentence: 時彼魔王向佛曲躬，合掌恭敬說如是偈：「我以清淨心，　　歸依於世尊，　速放我令去，　　從今行法行。」
translation: The demon king then bowed to the Buddha, put his palms together in respect, and spoke this verse, "With a pure heart, I take refuge in the Bhagavān. Quickly release me and let me go; from now on, I'll practice the Dharma."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以偈答曰：「我不障一人，　　來者及去者，　汝若能知道，　　隨汝欲所去。」
translation: At that point, the Bhagavān answered with this verse, "I won't hinder a single person, coming or going, so if you can know that, follow your desire to go."

source_sentence: 爾時，魔王復說偈曰：「如我所欲去，　　所樂自宮室，　今見五種縛，　　瞿曇之所縛。」
translation: The Māra King then spoke another verse, "As I wish to depart, I enjoy my own palace, and now I see the five kinds of fetters with which the Gautama is bound."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以偈答曰：「我斷諸分別，　　自解脫世間，　我既解脫縛，　　令他離惱害。」
translation: The Bhagavān then answered with a verse, "I ended discrimination and freed myself from the world; having freed myself from bondage, I caused others to be free of harm."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊即以佛眼觀視一切，此佛剎土地及虛空眾生遍滿，而說偈言：「汝等今當聽，　　一切普來者，　棄捨諸疑惑，　　且各默然住。
translation: At that point, the Bhagavān then looked at them all with the Buddha's eye, saw the Buddha's buddha land and the sky full of sentient beings, and spoke the verse, "Now, you must listen, all of you who have come universally, abandon your doubts and confusions, and stand silently.

source_sentence: 世間佛難值，　　法僧值亦難，　具足淨信難，　　菩提行復難。
translation: It's difficult to meet the buddhas of the world, difficult to meet the Dharma and saṃgha, difficult to have perfect pure faith, and even more difficult to practice enlightenment.

source_sentence: 親於世尊前，　　得聞法甚難，　能修於諸忍，　　此一時亦難。
translation: It's difficult to hear the teaching personally from the Bhagavān, and it's difficult to cultivate patience at this one time.

source_sentence: 調伏心為難，　　及修於空行，　能斷諸分別，　　一切世間惡。
translation: It's difficult to control the mind and cultivate the practice of emptiness, which stops discrimination and all worldly evils.

source_sentence: 菩提行難得，　　如我先所行，　我當為汝說，　　但說一華分，　暗陰令滅壞，　　示現無上道。
translation: The practice of enlightenment is difficult to attain, just like what I did before. I will explain it for you, but I will explain a part of the flower, which will extinguish the darkness and reveal the unsurpassed way.

source_sentence: 所得菩提者，　　今當斷三垢，　聽大師善說，　　度彼岸諸流，　捨諸大渴愛，　　建立三解脫，　安立三護等，　　三界諸煩惱，　散滅令無餘。
translation: Those who have attained enlightenment will now cut off the three defilements, listen to the great teacher's good teaching, cross the streams on the other side, abandon the great cravings, establish the three liberations, set up the three protections, and so forth, and dissipate the afflictions in the three realms so that there's no remainder.

source_sentence: 汝為供三寶，　復為法故來。
translation: You made offerings to the Three Treasures, and you've come because of the teaching.

source_sentence: 世尊天及魔，　三世加護故，　　三世惑覆心，　皆得最勝斷，　　得解脫三界，　滅煩惱之忍，　　及四種顛倒。
translation: Because the Bhagavān, gods, and Māra protect them in the three times, their deluded minds in all three times are most victoriously ended, and they attain liberation from the three realms, cease the tolerance of affliction, and the four kinds of delusion.

source_sentence: 顛倒諸凡夫，　　分別無體性，　彼非有忍器，　　眼等著諸色，　身口意覆翳，　　彼無四禪定，　親近於生死。
translation: Confused worldlings, who discriminate without essence, aren't endowed with the capacity for patience, are attached to forms such as the eye, are blinded by body, speech, and thought, don't have the four meditations, and are close to birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 聰明智慧者，　能修於禪定，　　彼今得解脫，　離於四顛倒，　　及解脫眾生，　自在拔四流，　　解知諸起滅，　所有調柔者，　　當得度彼岸。
translation: Those who are intelligent and wise enough to cultivate meditation are now liberated, free of the four mistaken attachments and liberated from sentient beings, freely remove the four currents, understand arising and ceasing, and become disciplined enough to cross over to the other side.

source_sentence: 菩薩具四行，　　及以無所畏，　正智皆能斷，　　眾生諸有縛，　能解知五陰，　　無漏離羂縛，　不復數數生，　　到有海彼岸。
translation: Equipped with the four practices and having no fear, the bodhisattva's right knowledge is able to end the bonds of sentient beings, understand the five aggregates, become untainted and free of the confines of the noose, cease to be born repeatedly, and reach the other shore of the ocean of existence.

source_sentence: 汝等諸佛前，　　速發露諸惡，　諸惡斷無餘，　　到彼無畏岸。
translation: You buddhas quickly reveal the evils, cut off all evil without remainder, and reach the other shore of fearlessness.

source_sentence: 所有生死苦，　　隨受有為者，　數數生諸有，　　隨逐於惡友，　當遠離惡友，　　斷除於惡見，　憶念生死苦，　　修習第一義。
translation: All suffering of birth-and-death, according to the experience of those who are financially productive, and countless births in existence, go along with evil friends, avoid evil friends, eliminate bad views, remember the suffering of birth-and-death, and cultivate the supreme truth.

source_sentence: 當飲無上水，　　應修習於空，　第一義無體，　　無實亦無相。
translation: They should drink the unsurpassed water, cultivate emptiness, and cultivate the ultimate truth, which has no body and no substance or characteristics.

source_sentence: 六根猶如空，　　此中無作者，　分別相如是，　　唯分別無法。
translation: The six faculties are like emptiness, which has no author, discriminates characteristics like this, and only discerns what's impossible.

source_sentence: 六受及六愛，　　六觸為其本，　六觸入如是，　　亦須解知空。
translation: The six sensations and six emotions, which have their roots in contact, and the six sense-fields that enter thus, must also be understood to be empty.

source_sentence: 觀察無一切，　　如法自體性，　無起亦無滅，　　此中見無實。
translation: He observes that there's nothing, just like the intrinsic nature of dharmas, that there's neither arising nor ceasing, and that this is seen as insubstantial.

source_sentence: 諸法同法性，　　三世無一物。
translation: All things are the same in nature as dharmas, and there's not a single thing in the three worlds.

source_sentence: 若知無熱惱，　　此道最無上。
translation: If you know that there's no agitation, this path is most unsurpassed.

source_sentence: 離十三我相，　　眾生想分別，　如是修羼提，　　此彼得解脫。」
translation: Freed from the 13 characteristics of self and the conceptual discrimination of sentient beings, he thus cultivates kṣanti, and this is Peter's liberation."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以無礙福力而無所畏，依種殖善根故，能變現出大圓音聲遍十方，說如此偈。
translation: At the time, the Bhagavān, fearlessly endowed with the power of unhindered merit and relying on the cultivation of good roots, was able to conjure up a great, full-blown voice that sounded out over the ten directions and spoke this verse.

source_sentence: 爾時，十方無量阿閦毘恒河沙譬喻等諸空不空五濁世界，悉皆聞此圓音演說，聞此聲已，彼剎那頃如是一一無量佛剎，無量無數百千俱胝那由他等，所有眾生甚無所欲，唯有清淨愛樂之心，於往昔所得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提更不退轉，或得種種三摩提羼提陀羅尼。
translation: At the time, this perfect voice was heard in measureless Akṣobhya Rājagṛha metaphors and other empty, nonempty, five-obscured worlds in ten directions, and after hearing it, in that instant or time there were measureless buddha bases and measureless, incalculable, hundreds of thousands of corpus nyutas and so forth, in which all sentient beings had few desires but only pure, joyous states of mind, and they no longer regressed from the unsurpassed, corrected, or various samādhi-kauṇḍinya dhāraṇīs they'd attained in the past.

source_sentence: 於此佛所集無量無數眾生，聞如此句義文字已，即得阿毘跋致，復有無量無數眾生，於三乘法各隨得度。
translation: After hearing these words and meanings from this Buddha's collection of measureless and countless sentient beings, they attain abhivartization, and measureless and countless sentient beings attain salvation in each of the three vehicles.

source_sentence: 爾時，光味菩薩摩訶薩，以己神力化作七寶階，以華遍布其上為蓮華座，欲令如來昇此座故，向佛恭敬曲躬合掌，說如是偈：「佛一切智月，　　觀世老病死，　憂患所沒溺，　　世間動不動，　為彼作法橋，　　佛觀滿剎土，　無量大眾生，　　悉皆合掌待。
translation: At the time, the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva of Radiant Taste used his spiritual powers to create a lotus seat made of seven jewels spread over the top of it with flowers, in order to make the Tathāgata ascend to this seat.

source_sentence: 分布施法會，　　示現己所得，　破眾生煩惱，　　無比方便智，　於此普示現。
translation: He distributes alms at rituals, shows what he's gained, destroys the afflictions of sentient beings, and has peerless knowledge of how to do it all here.

source_sentence: 佛昇蓮華座，　普雨大法雨，　　十方一切佛，　及餘智大仙，　　與佛作證明。
translation: The Buddha ascends to the lotus seat, universally raining down a great dharma rain, and all the buddhas of the ten directions and other wise great men testify with him.

source_sentence: 牟尼因陀羅，　　降伏大魔王，　自性空無有，　　知法如虛空。
translation: Muni Indra subdued the great demon king, whose own nature is empty and nonexistent, knowing that dharmas are like space.

source_sentence: 憶念昔誓願，　　轉無上法輪，　今當拔眾生，　　住於四流者。
translation: He recalls his past vow to turn the unsurpassed wheel of the Dharma and now will remove sentient beings who reside in the four streams.

source_sentence: 人中師子王，　　佛今知此法，　令度三有海，　　佛說無等法，　除眾生罪垢，　　世尊大智慧，　利益諸眾生，　　安置善逝道。」
translation: Now, lion king among men, the Buddha knows this teaching, causes the three oceans of existence to be crossed, teaches the peerless Dharma, rids sentient beings of the stain of sin, and provides great wisdom to benefit sentient beings and set them on the path to good passing."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊如其所化寶階之上鉢頭摩座昇蓮華臺。
translation: At that point, the Bhagavān ascended to the lotus dais from his seat atop the jeweled staircase like the one he had created, or from his bowl-druma seat.

source_sentence: 如來坐已，遍觀十方一切大眾告魔王言：「汝今於此應生歡喜，由汝因緣今得此處大集法門。」
translation: After he sat down, the Tathāgata looked around at all the people in the ten directions and told Māra King, "Now, you should rejoice here; it's because of your causes and conditions that you've now attained the great collection of teachings here."

source_sentence: 說此法時，無量無數所有眾生，今世來世皆得解脫，處胎殃橫老死四流，普各得度住吉祥道，又復令得虛空等智。
translation: When he teaches this teaching, measureless and countless sentient beings in the present and future worlds will be liberated from the four currents of birth, death, and old age, and they'll each be saved and stay on the auspicious path, and they'll attain the wisdom of space and so forth.

source_sentence: 「魔王！
translation: "Māra King!

source_sentence: 汝今此處為首，令諸眾生善根增長。
translation: Now, you're the leader here, causing sentient beings to develop good roots.

source_sentence: 魔王！
translation: Māra King!

source_sentence: 汝可請我說法，令此眾中高慢眾生，度諸流故而為說法。」
translation: You may invite me to preach the Dharma for you, so that the conceited among you will save the streams and preach it for you."

source_sentence: 是時，魔王說如是偈：「瞿曇若無過，　　及無瞋慢者，　云何驚動我，　　今此說大法？
translation: The Māra King then spoke this verse, "Gautama, if there's nothing wrong with you and you're not arrogant, why would you have startled me and explained the great teaching here?

source_sentence: 若有此瞋慢，　　云何得解脫？
translation: If someone has this anger and pride, how can they attain liberation?

source_sentence: 我今未審知，　　牟尼為我說。」
translation: Now, I have yet to examine it, but Muni has explained it for me."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊即以偈頌答魔王曰：「我處十月胎，　　同彼人中事，　汝魔欲害我，　　我都無穢憎。
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān answered the demon king with a verse, "I was in the womb in the tenth month, and I did the same thing as those among humans.

source_sentence: 我忍度諸惡，　　穢惡悉無餘，　我既出生已，　　汝復動大地，　雨石來害我。
translation: I've tolerated and spared all kinds of evil, and there's nothing left to defile.

source_sentence: 復欲斷我乳，　令乳速乾竭，　　無量不愛事，　何種而不作？
translation: You also want to cut off my milk, so that it will quickly dry up. What are the countless unattractive things that you don't do?

source_sentence: 我住禪定時，　遣諸女惱我；　　我又乞食時，　障他令不施，　　請我作國王，　令我輪生死。
translation: When I was in meditation, I sent women to trouble me; when I was begging for food, I hindered others from giving it to them, invited me to become king, and made me take a turn in birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 踰城出家時，　復令夜黑暗，　　兵眾圍遶城，　是皆汝所作。
translation: When I passed through the city and left home, I also caused the night to be dark, and I was surrounded by soldiers, all because of your actions.

source_sentence: 我乘神通往，　復放大風雨，　　令地為[土*冓]坑，　沙石高滿路；　　我住寂靜林，　現作畏惡聲，　　於彼苦行處，　吹作切寒風。
translation: When I ride the divine route, I again magnify the wind and rain, making the ground a [dirt*money] pit and filling the road with sand and gravel; I stay in a quiet forest and make a fearful noise, and I blow a cutting cold wind in that place of ascetic practice.

source_sentence: 在河欲度處，　汝復放暴流；　　現作猛師子，　復欲令殺我。
translation: At the place where I want to cross the river, you again let loose a violent current; now you act as a fierce lion, wanting to kill me again.

source_sentence: 我欲飲食時，　汝以毒和食；　　我往菩提樹，　雨下金剛雹，　　刀箭雨器仗，　袈裟法衣服，　　悉欲令塗污。
translation: When I want to drink, you mix food with poison; I go to the bodhi tree, rain down vajra hail, swords and arrows, rain weapons, and robes and Dharma garments, all of which I want to stain.

source_sentence: 我處金剛座，　　利益諸眾生，　彼時汝亦遣，　　諸女來惱我。
translation: I was sitting on my adamantine throne, benefiting all sentient beings, when you also sent those women to trouble me.

source_sentence: 汝并將軍眾，　　不憶害我時，　我無微塵意，　　於汝作惱亂。
translation: When you and your generals didn't remember harming me, I had no subtle thoughts about you that would cause you distress.

source_sentence: 我證無上道，　　已曾降伏汝，　汝今乃無恥，　　復說是惡語。
translation: I've already subdued you as I realized the unsurpassed path, but now you're shameless and speak evil words again.

source_sentence: 往以惡方便，　　惱大迦葉等，　無量眾生善，　　汝皆所滅壞。
translation: In the past, you used bad manners to trouble Mahākāśyapa and others, and you destroyed the goodness of measureless sentient beings.

source_sentence: 汝既無悲憐，　　今復欲害我，　我入城乞食，　　復放凶醉象，　調達放大石，　　三月食大麥，　孫陀羅惡聲，　　火坑惡毒食，　是皆汝所作，　　決定重惡業。
translation: Since you have no compassion, and now you want to harm me, I've gone into the city to solicit alms, released a fierce, drunken elephant, tamed a large rock, eaten barley in three months, made a terrible noise at Sundarī, and fed on a fire pit, all of which are your doing and determined to do heavy, bad actions.

source_sentence: 汝昔向道樹，　　威力并軍眾，　以無量刀箭，　　持來欲害我，　不動我一毛，　　何故復住此？
translation: You once headed for the road tree, with your might and your army, and you brought measureless swords and arrows to harm me, but you didn't touch a hair on my head; why do you stay here again?

source_sentence: 如為醉毒塗，　　起發俱胝魔，　那由他眾生，　　來滿此佛剎。
translation: Like the poison of drunkenness that raises a myriad of demons, those sentient beings come to fill this Buddha's buddha.

source_sentence: 如是證知我，　　我住慈悲心，　憐愍於一切。
translation: Knowing me this way, I abide in a compassionate state of mind, pitying them all.

source_sentence: 而汝常於我，　極作惡障礙。
translation: Yet you've always created harmful obstacles for me.

source_sentence: 此諸牟尼尊，　因陀羅牛王，　　悉現證知我。
translation: This is the venerable Muni, Indra the Bull, who all now knows me.

source_sentence: 我今於惡時，　　施作於佛事，　我為眾生故，　　住於解脫心，　縱汝加諸惡，　　我終不捨忍。
translation: Now, when I'm evil, I perform Buddha-works, and I abide in the mind of liberation for the sake of sentient beings, even though you do evil, I never relent and tolerate it.

source_sentence: 我無嫉妬意，　　穢惡諸過患，　我為隨攝汝，　　如是常勤勞。
translation: I have no jealousy about the faults of filth, and I've always labored like this to bring you into line.

source_sentence: 我欲寂滅汝，　　今應請我說，　甘露第一法，　　令三界寂滅。
translation: I want to extinguish you, so now you should ask me to teach you the supreme dharma of ambrosia, which will bring about the extinction of the three realms.

source_sentence: 為汝除惡業，　　汝速清淨意，　於我生依怙。
translation: Removing bad karma for you, you'll quickly purify your mind and create a support in me.

source_sentence: 我常清淨心，　欲令汝解脫，　　汝常懷惡心，　應當捨惡見，　　意作清淨信。
translation: I always have a pure mind and want to set you free, but you've always harbored a bad mind, so abandon bad views and cultivate a pure faith in your mind.

source_sentence: 汝今當覺知，　　不久得授記。」
translation: Now, you will realize that you'll soon be granted assurance of assurance."

source_sentence: 爾時，魔王復於佛所倍增瞋恨，從此欲去自知五縛，即欲出於可畏之聲復不能出，以己瞋力發熱毒氣，其氣猛盛欲害如來。
translation: At the time, the Māra King again increased his anger toward the Buddha, and from that desire to leave his five bonds of self-knowledge, he wanted to escape from the fearful sound but couldn't, and he produced a hot, poisonous breath with the power of his anger, which was so powerful that it wanted to harm the Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 是時，世尊以慈善力，變此惡氣為蘇摩那華蓋，普遍十方一切佛剎，於一切諸佛壽命安隱現說法者，蘇摩那蓋於虛空中近佛頂住。
translation: Then, with the power of charity, the Bhagavān transformed this bad breath into a Sumāna flower canopy that spread across all the buddha bases in the ten directions, and while all the buddhas lived in peace and taught the Dharma, the Sumāna canopy stood close to the Buddha's head in the sky.

source_sentence: 時彼佛剎所有菩薩摩訶薩各各請問：「今此華蓋從何而來？
translation: All the bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas in those buddha bases then asked, "Now, where did this floral canopy come from?

source_sentence: 是誰神力之所變化？」
translation: Who is it that is transformed by supernormal powers?"

source_sentence: 時彼諸佛各答所問諸菩薩言：「諸善男子！
translation: Each of those buddhas then answered the bodhisattvas who had asked, "Good sons!

source_sentence: 彼有世界名曰薩訶，五濁不淨，有佛世尊，名釋迦如來、阿羅訶、三藐三佛陀。
translation: "There's a world called Śākya, where the five turbidities are impure and there's a world-honored Buddha named Śākyamuni, Ārāha, and Samyak-saṃbuddha.

source_sentence: 以本願力故，成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，現在說法。
translation: After achieving supreme perfect enlightenment because of the power of his past vows, he now preaches.

source_sentence: 為欲摧滅諸魔境界力故；竪立一切諸佛力無所畏佛境界故；一切諸佛教法三寶種燈令久住故；一切善根增長故，以精進神力變化降伏一切外道之怨故；一切驚怖不吉諍論，惡夢惡相內外怨敵，鬪諍繫縛言訟不和，水旱荒儉非時之雨，寒熱風濕疫氣病癘，惡聲銷滅故；一切天、龍、夜叉、人、非人等悉令迴向故；一切剎利亦令迴向故；一切四姓誨以法義，然智慧炬示以正路故；一切家宅城邑聚落人主斷事，國王王宮市廛之處，悉令迴向故；一切星耀晝夜度數，半月一月時節年歲，悉皆正行故；一切五穀華果藥草，悉皆成熟故；一切工巧生業處所，不令散失所作成就故；一切身口意業過患悉得銷滅故；善作籌量念慧總持，勇猛無畏色相樂說，悉皆增長故；一切法無障明覺四聖種法作受持故；光顯大乘增長菩薩摩訶薩，安慰阿毘跋致地金剛心作護持故；作十地一味故；解無生法忍，受佛職建立菩提故；所化眾生如所隨攝轉大法輪，大悲普覆一切眾生，住波羅蜜，住無上道，雨於法雨，以法滋味充足眾生故；滿足一切諸佛之事，解脫一切四魔境界故；建立無餘涅槃之界故。
translation: 為欲摧滅諸魔境界力故；竪立一切諸佛力無所畏佛境界故；一切諸佛教法三寶種燈令久住故；一切善根增長故，以精進神力變化降伏一切外道之怨故；一切驚怖不吉諍論，惡夢惡相內外怨敵，鬪諍繫縛言訟不和，水旱荒儉非時之雨，寒熱風濕疫氣病癘，惡聲銷滅故；一切天、龍、夜叉、人、非人等悉令迴向故；一切剎利亦令迴向故；一切四姓誨以法義，然智慧炬示以正路故；一切家宅城邑聚落人主斷事，國王王宮市廛之處，悉令迴向故；一切星耀晝夜度數，半月一月時節年歲，悉皆正行故；一切五穀華果藥草，悉皆成熟故；一切工巧生業處所，不令散失所作成就故；一切身口意業過患悉得銷滅故；善作籌量念慧總持，勇猛無畏色相樂說，悉皆增長故；一切法無障明覺四聖種法作受持故；光顯大乘增長菩薩摩訶薩，安慰阿毘跋致地金剛心作護持故；作十地一味故；解無生法忍，受佛職建立菩提故；所化眾生如所隨攝轉大法輪，大悲普覆一切眾生，住波羅蜜，住無上道，雨於法雨，以法滋味充足眾生故；滿足一切諸佛之事，解脫一切四魔境界故；建立無餘涅槃之界故。

source_sentence: 有陀羅尼印，名金剛摧碎心高緣法等句入差別記，欲說故。
translation: There's a dhāraṇī seal called the vajra-destroying mind, which enters into the discriminating mind because it wants to explain the phrase "the high dependency of dharmas".

source_sentence: 「一切過去如來、阿羅訶、三藐三佛陀，名金剛摧碎心高緣法等句陀羅尼印入差別記，受持互相隨喜；及現在十方諸佛住世壽命將養，一切諸佛亦說彼金剛摧碎心高緣法等句陀羅尼印入差別記，現說受持互相隨喜。
translation: "All the tathāgatas, arhats, and samyak-saṃbuddhas of the past named the dhāraṇī seal of the phrase 'vajra-destroying mind, high-concern dharmas,' which is received and maintained with mutual joy, and all the buddhas of the present in the ten directions who will live out their lives also said that the dhāraṇī seal of the phrase 'vajra-destroying mind, high-concern dharmas,' which is received and maintained with mutual joy.

source_sentence: 於未來世十方世界，諸餘如來、阿羅訶、三藐三佛陀，所有諸佛當出於世，亦說此金剛摧碎心高緣法等句陀羅尼印入差別記，亦當說受持互相隨喜。」
translation: In the future world in ten directions, all the other tathāgatas, arhats, samyak-saṃbuddhas, and buddhas that will arise in the world will also teach this dhāraṇī seal of the adamantine mind-destroying, highly-conditional, and other phrases to enter into the distinctive memory, and they will also teach it, uphold it, and rejoice in each other."

source_sentence: 爾時，彼諸佛剎所有菩薩各各請佛，白言：「世尊！
translation: At that point, all the bodhisattvas in those buddha bases each invited the Buddha and said, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 此是何法？
translation: What is this dharma?

source_sentence: 我昔未聞金剛摧碎心高緣法等句陀羅尼印入差別記，能作如是無量利益，能具足如是不可思議法利，能作一切法無障礙明，乃至寂滅。」
translation: I've never heard before that the dhāraṇī seal of the adamantine-shattering mind, high-conditions dharma, and so forth, enters into discriminating memory, which is capable of producing such measureless benefits, fully possessing such unfathomable benefits, and producing unobstructed insight into all things, even to the point of extinction."

source_sentence: 諸佛世尊說此金剛摧碎心高緣法等句陀羅尼印入差別記時，一切魔力境界磨滅，乃至於彼無餘涅槃而般涅槃。
translation: When the Bhagavān explains this dhāraṇī seal of the adamantine mind that destroys the high dependency dharmas and enters into discriminating memory, all demonic forces and objects are annihilated, and he attains parinirvāṇa without remainder in that nirvāṇa.

source_sentence: 於諸眾生無量利益無量安樂，為欲憐愍一切世間，利益安樂無量天人眾生聚故。
translation: For the sake of pitying all the world and benefiting and comforting measureless crowds of gods, humans, and sentient beings, it's for measureless benefit and measureless comfort to all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 時彼諸佛告彼菩薩作如是言：「善男子！
translation: The buddhas then addressed the bodhisattva and said, "Good sons!

source_sentence: 我亦共汝往彼娑婆世界，釋迦如來、阿羅訶、三藐三佛陀之所住處。
translation: I'll also go with you to that Saha world where the Śākyamuni Tathāgata and the Ārāha Samantabhadra Buddhas reside.

source_sentence: 所有十方現在世尊壽命將養，諸餘世界彼諸世尊，共一切菩薩前後圍繞，并聲聞僧俠侍於前。
translation: All the world-honored ones in the ten directions are now approaching the end of their lives, and there are world-honored ones in other worlds who are surrounded by all the bodhisattvas and śrāvakas and attendants of the saṃgha.

source_sentence: 彼諸世尊亦當往彼釋迦如來大集會所，彼釋迦如來共諸佛，亦當說此金剛摧碎心高緣法等句陀羅尼印入差別記，當共受持，當互隨喜，利益眾生遮惡業行，為滿賢行滿無上智故。
translation: Those world-honored ones will also go to that great gathering place of the Śākyamuni Tathāgata, and that Śākyamuni Tathāgata and the buddhas will also explain this dhāraṇī seal of the adamantine-shattering mind, the high dependency dharma, and other phrases, which will be accepted together, will be mutually pleasing, will benefit sentient beings, will prevent bad karmic actions, and will fulfill good conduct and perfect unsurpassed cognition.

source_sentence: 一切諸佛今悉集彼，與諸菩薩聲聞僧等圍繞夾侍，今悉現前在彼佛所。
translation: All the buddhas are now gathered there, surrounded by bodhisattvas, śrāvakas, and monks, and they're all present in the Buddha's place.

source_sentence: 若汝欲得此金剛摧碎心高緣法等句陀羅尼印入差別記，應往彼聽，及欲供養無量無數恒河沙等之所譬喻一切佛剎諸佛世尊。
translation: If you want to get this dhāraṇī seal of the Vajra-devastating Mind, Highly Contingent Dharma, and so forth, you should go there and listen, and if you want to make offerings to the incalculable and countless Ganges River Sands metaphors of all the buddhas and world-honored ones.

source_sentence: 一時、現在及欲見彼，昔所未見諸佛境界、菩薩境界、諸天境界、諸魔境界、佛剎莊嚴之所嚴飾，及欲見彼昔所未見無量佛集者，今正是時。
translation: This is the right time, right now, and the desire to see them, the realms of buddhas, the realms of bodhisattvas, the realms of gods, the realms of Māra, the adornments of buddha bases, and the desire to see the immeasurable collection of buddhas that hadn't been seen in the past.

source_sentence: 可共我等往彼世界釋迦如來所住之處大集法會。」
translation: We can go together to the great Dharma assembly in that world where the Śākyamuni Tathāgata lives."

source_sentence: 時彼菩薩摩訶薩各白佛言：「如是，如是。
translation: The bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas then each said to the Buddha, "So it is.

source_sentence: 大德世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等當與如來俱往彼處娑婆世界釋迦如來所集法會。
translation: We will go with the Tathāgata to the Dharma assembly assembled by the Śākyamuni Tathāgata in the Śrāvastī world.

source_sentence: 於彼佛所昔所未聞，為聽彼法金剛摧碎心高緣法等句陀羅尼印入差別記故。
translation: At that Buddha's place, we've never heard of him before, so we'll listen to his Dhāraṇī seal of the adamantine, mind-crushing, high-contingent, and other phrases and enter into the distinctive memory.

source_sentence: 我等於彼無量無數諸佛世尊，一時一集住世將養者得供養故，及聞彼法。
translation: At those countless and incalculable buddhas, we were able to make offerings to those who would support us if we were gathered there one at a time, and we heard that teaching.

source_sentence: 我等於娑婆世界，得見彼四種神通境界嚴飾普莊嚴事。
translation: In the sahā world, we've been able to see the four kinds of adornments of their superknowledges and their adornments.

source_sentence: 及見彼大集法會莊嚴。
translation: We'll also see the adornment of that great assembly of teachings.

source_sentence: 我等若往彼佛剎說陀羅尼時，得容止處不？
translation: When we go to that Buddha's buddha to preach the dhāraṇī, will we be able to find a place to stay?

source_sentence: 及得承事供養彼佛聽法以不？
translation: And will you be able to serve and make offerings to that Buddha and listen to the Dharma?

source_sentence: 又彼如是所集徒眾菩薩摩訶薩得供養不？」
translation: And will the bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas who are thus gathered be able to make offerings?"

source_sentence: 時彼諸佛各各告彼諸大菩薩摩訶薩及大聲聞，作如是言：「諸善男子！
translation: The buddhas then each addressed the great bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and śrāvakas, saying, "Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝等莫疑於彼世界有容止處不？
translation: Don't you wonder if there's room in that world?

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 諸佛境界入無邊平等智巧，無邊成熟眾生，無邊廣博空處。
translation: The buddha's sphere of entry has infinite equality of wisdom and skill, infinite maturation of sentient beings, and infinite breadth of the realm of emptiness.

source_sentence: 諸善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 彼釋迦如來大巧方便具足。
translation: That Śākyamuni tathāgata is fully equipped with great skillful means.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 所有眾生、眾生界所攝者，但界入所依處。
translation: "All sentient beings and those included in the sentient being realm are simply the basis for the realm's entry.

source_sentence: 彼諸眾生，若一一眾生，假使如須彌等身，彼釋迦如來，能令一切無量眾生，如是等身入芥子中。
translation: If each of those sentient beings were to assume that they were like Sumeru's equal body, the Tathāgata could cause all sentient beings without measure to enter a mustard seed like this.

source_sentence: 一一眾生所居之處，皆得廣博空處，遠不相見一切眾生，如是大身入一芥子，而不覺知有增減相。
translation: Where each sentient being lives, they all attain a vast, empty space, far removed from seeing all sentient beings with such a large body inside a mustard seed, and they don't perceive any increase or decrease in that body.

source_sentence: 「復次，善男子！
translation: "Furthermore, good sons!

source_sentence: 所有地界是堅[革*卬]者，釋迦如來悉能令彼一切地界入一最細隣虛塵中，彼大地微塵亦不覺知有增減相，是名如來巧方便智，如是具足。
translation: "When all the earth's realms are hard [ge*ang], the Tathāgata is able to cause all of them to enter the subtlest neighboring space dust, and that tiny particle of earth doesn't perceive any increase or decrease in its characteristics; this is called the Tathāgata's skillful and expedient knowledge that's thus complete.

source_sentence: 「復次，善男子！
translation: "Furthermore, good sons!

source_sentence: 一切水界所有津潤，釋迦如來，悉能令彼一切水界入一最細毛端之中，彼一毛端一切水界，亦不覺知有增減相。
translation: "The Tathāgata is able to cause all the water elements to enter the finest tip of a hair, and he doesn't perceive any increase or decrease in the characteristics of all the water elements at the tip of that hair.

source_sentence: 「復次，善男子！
translation: "Furthermore, good sons!

source_sentence: 一切火界所有暖相，悉能令彼一切三世所有火界入一最細隣虛塵中，而彼火界入細微塵行自境界，猶如廣博虛空之處。
translation: All the warmth of the fire element can cause all the fire elements in the three worlds to enter a single, subtlest neighboring space, and that fire element enters a fine, dusty form of its own element, just like the vast expanse of space.

source_sentence: 「復次，善男子！
translation: "Furthermore, good sons!

source_sentence: 所有風界可覺者，釋迦如來悉能令彼一切風界入一毛孔，彼一切風於一毛孔行自境界，猶如廣博虛空之處。
translation: "Whenever there's a perceptible element of wind, the Tathāgata is able to cause all those elements to enter a single pore, and all those elements move through their own objects in that single pore like the vast expanse of space.

source_sentence: 「復次，善男子！
translation: "Furthermore, good sons!

source_sentence: 十方佛剎一切眾生及彼四大，釋迦如來悉能令彼入一最細隣虛塵內，一切眾生并彼四大，行自境界所用之事，猶如虛空不相嬈亂，亦不覺知彼一微塵有增減相，是名如來巧方便智，如是具足。
translation: The Tathāgata is able to cause all sentient beings in the buddha bases of the ten directions and their four elements to enter the subtlest neighboring space dust, and all sentient beings and their four elements perform the tasks of their own objects as if they were empty space and weren't disturbed by each other, nor do they perceive that a tiny particle of dust has marks of increase or decrease; this is called the Tathāgata's knowledge of skillful means that are thus complete.

source_sentence: 「復次，善男子！
translation: "Furthermore, good sons!

source_sentence: 乃至三世所攝眾生，六入行取願持語言，音聲文字言說三行，作業陰界分別長養，種種所作。
translation: "Up to the point where sentient beings included in the three times have the six sense-fields, taken actions, vowed, maintained speech, made sounds, written words, three practices, worked the aggregates, discriminated the elements, and raised them in various ways.

source_sentence: 彼一切眾生往昔已來，三世所攝六趣生死起滅，乃至一切眾生三世所攝，過剎那，羅婆、牟忽多者，乃至一切眾生三世所攝，乃至及一切眾生三世所攝受，所受苦樂覺知。
translation: All those sentient beings from the past, the six destinies of birth and death that were included in the three times arise and cease, up to all sentient beings included in the three times, past moments, rabhas and mahouts, up to all sentient beings included in the three times, up to and including all sentient beings included in the three times, and they perceive the pain and pleasure that they experience.

source_sentence: 彼一切一剎那頃，彼釋迦如來悉能覺知，若干諸相悉具足知，而如來不分別，無分別無思念，如三世際悉知是相。
translation: For a split second, the Tathāgata fully knows them all, and he fully knows all their various aspects, yet the Tathāgata doesn't discriminate them, doesn't discriminate them, doesn't think about them, and knows them all as they are in the three worlds.

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: "Good sons!

source_sentence: 諸佛入境界智方便，平等成熟眾生方便具足。」
translation: The buddhas' knowledge and skill in realms of entry and the perfection of skill in equally maturing sentient beings."

source_sentence: 爾時，諸佛說釋迦如來如此相時，種種諸方彼諸如來各各徒眾，無量無數百千菩薩，願智神通勝妙境界，皆度彼岸。
translation: At the time the Buddhas spoke of the Tathāgata Śākyamuni's appearance, each of the Tathāgata's disciples in various directions and the hundreds of thousands of bodhisattvas with measureless and countless wishes, knowledge, and superb abilities all crossed to the other shore.

source_sentence: 寶星陀羅尼經卷第五
translation: Jewel Star Dhāraṇī Sutra, Volume 5
